tool_description: Aggregates and summarizes guest reviews and ratings for accommodation properties from multiple review platforms.

property_ids.description: List of property IDs to aggregate reviews for

review_sources.description: Review platforms to include: booking_com, tripadvisor, google, expedia

min_review_count.description: Minimum number of reviews required to include property

recent_only.description: Whether to focus on reviews from the last 12 months

error_messages: Invalid property IDs: Provide 1-50 valid property identifier strings.
Invalid review sources: Use supported platforms: booking_com, tripadvisor, google, expedia, agoda.
Invalid min_review_count: Must be a positive integer (1-1000).
No reviews found: Properties have insufficient reviews to generate aggregated ratings.
Review data unavailable: Unable to access review data for some properties.
usage: Provide property_ids array and optionally specify review_sources, min_review_count, and recent_only. Returns aggregated ratings and review summaries.

property_ids.description: Property IDs that have sufficient review data

review_counts.description: Total number of reviews for each property

rating_distributions.description: Distribution of ratings as percentage strings (e.g., '40%,30%,20%,10%,0%')

review_highlights.description: Key positive and negative points from recent reviews
